thread.title: Incredible footage emerges of David Haye's trainer Shane McGuigan appearing to PUNCH a fan
thread.title_full: Incredible footage emerges of David Haye's trainer Shane McGuigan appearing to PUNCH a fan

author: Alex Smith
title: Incredible footage emerges of David Haye's trainer Shane McGuigan appearing to PUNCH a fan
text:
Sport Incredible footage emerges of David Haye's trainer Shane McGuigan appearing to PUNCH a fan The coach threw in the towel in the 11th round to hand the Bomber a knock out win Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Shane McGuigan appears to punch fan Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
This is the moment David Haye's trainer Shane McGuigan appeared to PUNCH a fan after his fighter lost to Tony Bellew . 
Team Haye were slowly walking back to the dressing room when McGuigan allegedly landed a blow over the barriers at the O2 Arena. It is understood his reaction may have been provoked by Bellew supporters gloating and abusing Haye over his defeat. 
McGuigan, whose dad is former Irish WBA featherweight champion Barry McGuigan, prepared the Hayemaker for his fight on Saturday night. 
The 28-year-old was busy during the battle as he was forced to strap his boxer's leg with tape - after he injured his Achilles heal in the fifth round. Haye and McGuigan in training pre-fight (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Read More Haye and McGuigan were joined by Jamie Redknapp last month (Photo: VISIONHAUS) Shane is the son of boxing legend Barry McGuigan (Photo: PA) Read More
